product_name: Yeti Cooler Security Cable Lock and Bracket
long_description: Protect your Yeti cooler from theft by securing it in the back of your truck or to the picnic table at the campsite with the Cooler Security cable lock and bracket. High-strength carbon steel bracket fits into the tie-down slot on your Yeti cooler; 6-ft.-long braided steel cable threads through the bracket. Lock the cable around a secure object, such as a tie-down point in the bed of your truck or the leg of a picnic table at the campsite. Yeti Cooler Security cable lock and bracket secures your cooler while still allowing access to the inside. Includes 2 keys.
short_description: Protect your Yeti cooler from theft by securing it in the back of your truck or to the picnic table at the campsite with the Cooler Security cable lock and bracket.
